concept.title: Prerequisites
concept.shortdesc: The following prerequisites are required to get up and running with the Couchbase .NET SDK Beer Sample Application:

ul.li: Couchbase Server 2.5 or greater installed locally (you can always use a remote cluster, you'll just have to configure your application accordingly)

conbody.p: *Note that versions of Visual Studio or NuGet may work, but this tutorial has not been tested on them at the time of writing.
